summary: An Ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 3097 for the improvement of Howard Avenue North, from Mercer Street to Southlake Avenue, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues; all in the City of Seattle, under Ordinance No. 37674 amended by Ordinance No. 38351, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
